snippet.title: Cubetractor Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Website: www.ludochip.com
Steam game: bit.ly/cubetractor
A pixel art styled top-down action puzzler, Cubetractor features a tower attack (rather than tower defense) mechanic, infused with old-school bullet dodging and zelda-esque movement.

You never shoot or attack directly in Cubetractor. Rather, you pull cubes to crush enemies. Be careful! Because you can be crushed by your own cubes too.

If you pull 2 cubes together you can build turrets and other structures. There are 3 different types of cubes you'll encounter, and 6 different structure types to unlock, each with their own unique strategic value as you progress through the game.

The game is challenging -- you'll have to dodge enemy fire while constructing the right structures to overwhelm your targets. It gets excitingly hectic in the later levels.
